skills.title: Structural Design
skills.description: Drawing, modeling, analysis, and preparing documentation of construction works. Ensuring the safety and sustainability of the project. I do this using Autocad, FreeCAD, SketchUp, and StaadPro.

skills.title: Quantity Surveying
skills.description: Managing and controlling the costs of the Project while maintaining high standard quality. Tools used by surveyors have significantly evolved. I can work on tools like MS Excel, MS Word and AutoCAD.

skills.title: Project Management
skills.description: Planning, executing, and closing projects, ensuring they are completed on time, within budget, and to the specified quality standards. Tools I use are; AutoCAD, MS Project, and MS Excel.

skills.title: Land Surveying
skills.description: Measuring and mapping the land, ensuring that construction and development is carried out accurately and according to legal and regulatory standards. I can operate on theodolite, Total station, GPS and Google Earth.

portfolio.title: Floor Plan
portfolio.description: The floor plan of a house details all layouts of spaces and the placement of windows, doors, fixtures, and other furniture. I did a drawing of the floor plan with the help of AutoCAD.

portfolio.title: Reinforced Concrete Column and Footing
portfolio.description: Drawing of column and footing reinforcement, showing the section and dimensions. I did a drawing of the Reinforced Concrete Column and Footing with the help of AutoCAD.

portfolio.title: Roof truss
portfolio.description: A roof truss is a structural framework designed to support a roof, ensuring its stability and distribution of loads. I did a drawing of the roof truss with the help of AutoCAD.
